## Releases

### CMSSW_7_2_0_pre6 is out

### Changes since CMSSW_7_2_0_pre5:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_2_0_pre5...CMSSW_7_2_0_pre6


1. [5265](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5265)  from @VinInn: Clean RunningAverage use `reconstruction`

1. [5151](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5151)  from @nickmccoll: <font class="bold red">New strip cpe</font> `reconstruction`

1. [5173](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5173)  from @Dr15Jones: Have TkCloner return std::unique_ptr for factory functions `core`  `reconstruction`

1. [5163](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5163)  from @mtosi: HLT track monitor in 2015 `dqm`

1. [5152](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5152)  from @boudoul: removing fake dependency `reconstruction`

## Releases

### CMSSW_7_2_0_pre6 is out

1. [5116](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5116)  from @wmtford: Add a few new pixel recHit validation histograms `dqm`

1. [5133](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5133)  from @boudoul: Pixel Phase1 xmls for 72X `geometry`

1. [5124](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5124)  from @cerati: Rebin vertex validation histos v2 `dqm`

1. [5087](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5087)  from @rovere: Improve histo ranges `dqm`

1. [5076](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5076)  from @mtosi: strip cluster on/off track dqm@hlt `dqm`  `reconstruction`

1. [5097](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5097)  from @wmtford: Add a few new strip recHit validation histograms `dqm`

1. [5102](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5102)  from @VinInn: fix long standing typo in TIDLayer `reconstruction`

1. [5065](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5065)  from @Dr15Jones: Use static only when debugging PixelThresholdClusterizer `reconstruction`
